Portal 2 is among my favorite games of all time.  The main reason I like this game is, of course, the puzzles.  However, I also love the writing so much!  Both of these statements were true for the original Portal game.  However Portal 2 made a number of improvements to the game.  The tutorial section is much easier for new players to follow.  The zoom feature and the visual tool showing locations of previous portals are really helpful.  Also, the graphics have been improved significantly overall and you feel even more immersed into the Aperture world than the first game.  Some interesting new test elements have also been added.

One huge difference between this game and the original Portal game is the addition of a co-op game mode.  I have to say, I'm thoroughly impressed with this game feature.  In the limited amount of time that I've spent trying to make my own test chambers I've learned that's it's extremely difficult to make a test chamber simple and yet difficult to solve.  Valve did an amazing job at creating a series of test chambers in which the players have 2 sets of portals to work with, and yet they still find it hard to get to the door at the end!

The other huge difference in Portal 2 is known as the Perpetual Testing Initiative.  As I alluded earlier, the game allows you to create your own test chambers and post them for other people to play.  The feature adds a theoretically infinite amount of content for the player to enjoy.  The content includes a rating system which then allows players to search for chambers based on rating and popularity.  Just as I was impressed by valve, I have also been impressed and amazed by some of the player-made content in this section.

Love this game so much!  Highly recommend.

Just like the original Portal, Portal 2 is an amazing and unique game unlike anything else. This game has taken Portal and expanded greatly on the concept, including my favorite part co-op. The graphics and individual detail is great and the commentary, as expected, is funny and interactive with your play.  I'd highly recomend this game to any one seeking a fun puzzle game to play solo or with a friend. 

My only complaint with this game is that there isn't a Portal 3 out yet.......... also where is my freaking CAKE!

Когда то об этой игре говорили почти все окружающие меня люди. Естественно катали все на пиратке. А что до меня? Я не играл.
 Помню тот день, когда купил полный комплект игр VALVE, играл только в кс и халфу.. Но потом руки дошли до этого творения.
Кампания меня затянула, мне нравилась история.. Вжился в роль персонажа, хотя она и другого пола (я сексист, если дело касается того, за какого чара мне играть). Интерес был просто ОГРОМЕН, как слово написанное капсом на фоне малюсеньких букв. Когда прошел- плакал (не буквально, я же не баба).
 Дело дошло до кооператива. Опять залип в это чудо.. "ЙА РОБАТ!1".. Прошел все миссии с другом. Потом проходил пару уровней с товарищем из CS:GO.
"Я НАЗЫВАЮ ЭТУ ИГРУ ШУТЕРОМ, ГДЕ НЕ НАДО НИКОГО УБИВАТЬ, КРОМЕ ТУРЕЛЕЙ И ОДНОГО РОБОТА".
Моя оценка: 10 порталов из 10.
Awesome game, one of the best I have ever played. Both Single player and multiplayer are great.

[h1]中文评测[/h1]
回首2011年，我还不知道Portal系列的两款游戏的时候，我在网络上看见一款名叫《给力涂鸦（Tag: The Power of Paint）》的游戏。它发行于2009年，是当年IGF最佳学生游戏奖得主。在其Wikipedia页面下方我找到这样一段话：
[quote][i]Tag[/i]发行以后，其程序员都被招募到了V社。而他们的工作也被整合成[i]Portal 2[/i]中全新的解密要素[/quote]
直到今天我才注意到这件事情，这是因为我刚刚得知任天堂2015年在Wii U平台上发行了一款名叫《油彩军团（Splatoon）》的涂料游戏。

[h1]English Review[/h1]
Back in 2011, I didn't know anything about Portal or Portal 2, but I find a fun game called [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tag:_The_Power_of_Paint][i]Tag: The Power of Paint[/i][/url]. [i]Tag[/i] is released in 2009 and won the IGF Student Showcase award in the same year. Then I noticed the following paragraph in [b]Wikipedia[/b]:
[quote]Since the release of Tag, the programmers have been brought on as developers for Valve Corporation. Their work was incorporated into new puzzle elements involving the paint concept into Portal 2[/quote]
Hell yeah, I haven't noticed the relationship between these two of my favorite ACT+PUZ games until today, because to my astonishment, Nintendo released a game called [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Splatoon][i]Splatoon[/i][/url] on Wii U in 2015.

Игра очень интересная. Хорошие сюжетная и геймплейная составляющие, отличная графика, хоршая оптимизация и т.д. По моему мнению у игры нет минусов и поэтому я всем советую поиграть и тем более сейчас идёт летняя распродажа, так что покупайте и играйте.
